meanings.definition: The period of time during which school is in session.
meanings.sent1: During schooltimes, students learn new things in class.
meanings.sent2: I have many friends from my schooltimes.
meanings.sent3: At schooltimes, the cafeteria always smells like delicious food.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of schooltimes are like pages in a book, each one holding a different story.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bell ringing at schooltimes is a familiar melody to all students.

meanings.definition: The activities and experiences associated with attending school.
meanings.sent1: My favorite part of schooltimes is playing with my friends during recess.
meanings.sent2: I miss the fun of schooltimes now that I am older.
meanings.sent3: During schooltimes, the schoolyard is filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The memories made during schooltimes are like treasures to cherish forever.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of a new school year always marks the beginning of schooltimes.
